definition: Tiananmen Gate, entrance of the Imperial City in Beijing
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)
pants fly is down/the barn door is open

sentences.english: After we left our luggages in the hotel, then went to visit Tian'an men Square directly.
sentences.chinese: 我們把行李放到酒店後，就直接去參觀天安門。

sentences.english: Stalks of grain, representing the peasant population, surround the gate.
sentences.chinese: 圍繞着天安門的稻穗代表了中國的農民階級。

sentences.english: Do you know where I can buy a bus ticket to Tian'anmen Square?
sentences.chinese: 你知道我在哪裏買去天安門的公共汽車票嗎？

sentences.english: The first flame torcher Liu Xiang ran over Tian'an men Square during domestic torch relay for Beijing Olympic.
sentences.chinese: 北京奧運會境內第一棒火炬手劉翔跑過天安門廣場。

sentences.english: Tian An Men Square looks even more beautiful with all lights on.
sentences.chinese: 所有的燈都亮着，天安門廣場顯得更加漂亮。

sentences.english: The emblem was mounted on the Tiananmen Gate on the occasion of the first anniversary of the People’s Republic.
sentences.chinese: 在建國一週年之際，國徽掛上了天安門。

sentences.english: Several dead bodies lay under the portrait of Mao on Tiananmen Gate.
sentences.chinese: 幾具屍體放置在毛之下畫象在天安門門。

sentences.english: Two special vehicles will operate at around Tianamen Square, Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 兩臺特殊車輛將在北京天安門周圍工作。

sentences.english: The two stone lions by the Gate of Tian'anmen, one on each side were meant as sentries.
sentences.chinese: 這兩個石獅子的門天安門，每方都意味着作爲哨兵。

sentences.english: The Museum of Chinese Revolution is on the right of Tiananmen Squre.
sentences.chinese: 中國革命歷史博物館就在天安門廣場的右側。

sentences.english: Prominent anti-American slogans in Tienanmen Square have still not been taken down.
sentences.chinese: 天安門廣場上顯眼的反美標語仍沒有被撤下。

sentences.english: To the west of Tian An Men is Zhongshan Park.
sentences.chinese: 天安門迤西是中山公園。

sentences.english: Moreover, he stood on the Tiananmen rostrum, announcing its foundation.
sentences.chinese: 還有，他曾站在天安門城樓上，宣告新中國的成立。

sentences.english: The appearance of Tiananmen Copied Poems is an important phenomenon in contemporary literature history.
sentences.chinese: 《天安門詩抄》的出現是當代文學史上的重要現象。

sentences.english: The Peking Duck restaurant is just south of Tiananmen Square.
sentences.chinese: 北京烤鴨店就在天安門的南面。

sentences.english: Find a bunch of people gather around Tian An Men to make a congestion for 5mins.
sentences.chinese: 找一羣人聚集在天安門擁堵此門5分鐘。

definition: the Forbidden City/abbr. for 故宮博物院|故宫博物院[Gu4 gong1 Bo2 wu4 yuan4]
a drum tower/Drum Tower, historic attraction in Xian, Beijing etc
Qianmen subway station on Beijing Subway Line 2
front door/main entrance/honest and upright approach (as opposed to 後門|后门, back-door or under the counter)
abbr. for 奧林匹克運動會|奥林匹克运动会/Olympic Games/the Olympics
Zhonglou district of Changzhou city 常州市[Chang2 zhou1 shi4], Jiangsu
bell tower/campanile/clock tower/Bell Tower, historic attraction in Xian, Beijing etc
